definition: how well you understand what you're perceiving
our ability to see, hear, or become aware of a stimulus through our senses
a positive or negative feelings brought about by chemicals released in the brain
whether you like or dislike something which is influenced by a combination of cognition, perception, and emotions
a set of principles concerned with the nature and appreciation of beauty, especially in art.
a non-human species used to study some biological phenomena or process to provide insight into how the phenomena or process works in other species.
within certain limits of what is typical, or occurs most often
